data.title: Concept of "The God Particle" in Design Work of Marek Budzynski
data.meta_description: Concept of “the God Particle” in Design Work of Marek Budzynski - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses the concept of God in the architectural design work of Polish architect Marek Budzynski. It describes how Budzynski's work in the 1970s-2000s was inspired by eco-philosophy and the teachings of Pope John Paul II, aiming to harmonize architecture with nature. It provides details on two of Budzynski's most notable projects - the University of Warsaw Library and the Temple of Divine Providence in Warsaw - and analyzes how they manifested his vision of integrating architecture with the landscape in an organic way.
data.text: Concept of "The God Particle" in Design Work of Marek Budzynski
